Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Brevinin-1AUa (natural AMPs; frog, amphibians, animals; XXU; 1S=S, UCSS1a)
Sequence Information.Source: the Northern red-legged frog,Rana aurora aurora, North America

Literature Information.Literature: Activity: Active against E. coli (MIC 13 uM), P. aeruginosa (25 uM), E. cloacae (13 uM), K. pneumoniae (MIC 50 uM), S. aureus (MIC 3 uM), S. epidermidis (6 uM), E. faecalis (13 uM), Streptococcus Group B (13 uM), C. albicans (MIC 3 uM), and P.mirabilis (MIC >50 uM).Toxicity: highly hemolytic HC50=5 uM. Updated 5/2019; 7/2021
Literature Information.Author: Conlon JM, Sonnevend A, Davidson C, Demandt A, Jouenne T.2005
Literature Information.Title: Host-defense peptides isolated from the skin secretions of the Northern red-legged frog Rana aurora aurora.
